snippet: Three separate bomb attacks against Shiite mosques in the northern city of Kirkuk killed eight civilians on Friday and wounded 70 others, the police said.
abstract: Three separate bomb attacks against Shiite mosques in Kirkuk, Iraq, leave eight civilians dead and 70 others wounded.
lead_paragraph: Three separate bomb attacks against Shiite mosques in the northern city of Kirkuk killed eight civilians on Friday and wounded 70 others, the police said.

headline.main: Iraq: Multiple Bombings Kill 8 at Mosques in Kirkuk
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Multiple Bombings Kill 8 at Mosques in Kirkuk
